name: Tower of Non
description:
Battle your way as far as you can into an endless roguelike dungeon. Discover the secrets of the Tower, and survive...

***

If you like Tower of Non, rate it on Kongregate!

***

This project is currently in Beta. Help us test the game out and let us know what you think! Your feedback will help shape the game.

What this game is:

A procedurally generated dungeon that gets progressively more difficult as you descend into its depths. The further you go, the more you can discover about the Tower. Fight monsters, discover lore, collect power-ups, get a high score!

Inspired by classic games like Legend of Zelda and Mega Man, Tower of Non is intended to have very simple rules. You should be able to pick up the game in just a few minutes. Play sessions are intended to be short, but repeatable, so you can play a quick round or get lost for hours!

We plan to add much more content to keep play sessions feeling fresh: more environments, more monsters, more secrets!

Check this game out on Kongregate as well, where high scores get automatically shared:

http://www.kongregate.com/game...

Post screenshots and high scores in the comments!

(P.S. There is an SWF file for download, in case your browser won't play it.)

Artwork by Oryx Design Labs and E Bros Entertainment

Programming by E Bros Entertainment
